headline: Devon Energy Just Landed a European Jackpot -- Thanks to Centrica's Gas Grab
summary: A 10-year deal could supercharge Devon's global exposure while giving Centrica a TTF-indexed edge in LNG markets.

headline: Devon Energy and Centrica Ink Major LNG Supply Deal
summary: U.S.-based Devon Energy Corporation has signed a 10-year natural gas supply agreement with UK’s Centrica, owner of British Gas, to provide LNG starting in 2028.

raw.headline: Devon Energy and Centrica Ink Major LNG Supply Deal
raw.summary: U.S.-based Devon Energy Corporation has signed a 10-year natural gas supply agreement with UK’s Centrica, owner of British Gas, to provide LNG starting in 2028.

headline: British Gas owner Centrica enters natural gas deal with US-based Devon Energy
summary: British Gas owner Centrica said on Friday it has entered into a natural gas agreement with Devon Energy, in which the U.S.-based firm will supply an equivalent to five LNG cargoes per year over a 10-year term from 2028.

raw.headline: British Gas owner Centrica enters natural gas deal with US-based Devon Energy
raw.summary: British Gas owner Centrica said on Friday it has entered into a natural gas agreement with Devon Energy, in which the U.S.-based firm will supply an equivalent to five LNG cargoes per year over a 10-year term from 2028.

headline: Centrica Signs 10-Year Deal for US Natural Gas With Devon Energy
summary: Centrica Energy, its trading arm, will receive 50,000 million British thermal units per day of natural gas from 2028, or the equivalent of five liquefied natural gas cargoes per year, according to a statement on Friday.  The deal expands Centrica’s global gas business after the recent announcement of a New York office.  The agreement will also help the firm to manage the price risk in its liquefied natural gas portfolio by aligning feed gas rates with European futures.

The agreement will also help the firm to manage the price risk in its liquefied natural gas portfolio by aligning feed gas rates with European futures.
